title: DXC Technology
description: I joined DXC as an Associate Professional Software Engineer fresher where I got my first professional project with NAB(National Australia Bank) where I learned all about ReactJS front-end web-development from best of the mentors who were from India, Australia, Philippines & Vietnam. Experienced working with agile methodologies, using 3rd party UI Toolkit libraries & constantly evolving client requirements

bullets.text: Write accessible, reusable, interactive and unit-tested react components for clients that can be used across different internal projects
Engineered and maintained code for client primarily using TypeScript, ReactJS,styled-components and GraphQL
Communicate with teams of UI-engineers, UX-designers, testers and clients on day-to-day basis

title: DXC Technology
description: Continued my work as a ReactJS frontend dev, started the POOLMASTER project from scratch where we utilized ReactJS18, TypeScript, Axios, ReduxJS, Kendo-react-components, MUI components, react-testing-library and SASS while simultaneously focusing on enhancing my skills by started delving a bit more into various modern tools like TailwindCSS, React-Tanstack Query, NextJS 13+

bullets.text: Created reusable components that can be utilized in various other applications, improving development efficiency.
Utilized MUI (Material-UI) and Kendo React components to design and implement beautiful and user-friendly interfaces
Wrote unit-tested components using react-testing-library and jest, ensuring high code quality and reliability.
Collaborated with backend developers to structure the correct data responses from the APIs ensuring smoothfrontend-backend integration.
